thread.title: Iron Man Experience headed to Hong Kong Disneyland
thread.title_full: Iron Man Experience headed to Hong Kong Disneyland

title: Iron Man Experience headed to Hong Kong Disneyland
text:
Iron Man Experience headed to Hong Kong Disneyland Sunday August 16, 2015 Print Article 
The Stark Tower will be featured in the ride, a familiar sight in the Iron Man movies. — Disney Parks pic HONG KONG, Aug 16 — Hong Kong’s Disneyland is set to have a new attraction with the Iron Man Experience. It will the first Marvel ride in any Disneyland and will open late 2016. 
What can visitors expect? Besides a recreation of the iconic Stark Tower building seen in the Iron Man films, visitors will experience a storyline where they will fight along Iron Man to vanquish the forces of evil. It will be a simulator ride similar to the Star Tours ride. 
The ride itself is just part of the Stark Expo that will be featured in Tomorrowland. It will showcase inventions by Howard and Tony Stark, with the Iron Wing being a key attraction. It is a large Iron Man suit that will let guests experience being clad in Stark-manufactured armour. 
Disney’s new theme park addition was announced in 2013, but this year’s D3 gave more details about the ride as well as revealing more concept art. More Stories for You:
